About me.

>

Hi, I'm Aaron

I am a Junior Front-End Web Developer with strong knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript

I am passionate about programming and my inspiration and creativity are what motivate me to develop my profession. I strive to stand out when it comes to my work am constantly looking for ways to improve my craft. Although I am just a junior developer with limited experience at the moment, I am confident with my work ethic, dedication, and perseverance, I can become a successful web developer.

I am currently looking for the opportunity to showcase my talents, expand my knowledge, and gain valuable experience as a developer.

Education

I graduated from the Computer Programmer Analyst program at Durham College back in June 2018. I have also completed the Front-End Web Development course at teamtreehouse.com

01 / CSS GRID Portfolio Site

Project Description

A simple responsive portfolio website template made using both CSS Grid and flexbox. CSS Grid is used to setup the grid layout of the website which helps with making the website responsive through the use of the grid column and row features that CSS grid provides. I used flexbox to assist with placement as well as the direction of the content within each section.

VISIT SITE

02 / Former Portfolio

Project Description

This is my previously used website portfolio. At the time I was learning alot about css animations and wanted to experiment with it at the time. That being said I felt that the overall design and of the website throughout each page wasn't consistent

VISIT SITE

03 / ReactJs To-do List

Project Description

A simple to do list created with ReactJs. This is my first react project which contains features that allow the user to add, edit, and delete tasks through retrieving the state, listening for changes, and setting the new state of the list.

VISIT SITE

04 / JavaScript Card Game

Project Description

A fairly simple javascript card matching game. The user is given 5 turns to match the given set of cards, deducting 1 turn everytime they do not find a matching pair. (this site is not responsive)

VISIT SITE

05 / Simple Portfolio Template

Project Description

One of my first projects. A simple portfolio website that emphasizes on the content instead of the design of the page.
